content: Hi Jen! Great question and love that you want to share what we are doing! We prefer people to go through our program and trainings so they have all the tools they need to be successful especially if we are not sure how they may lean!

So, just to summarize and make sure: As long as we send folks to mobilize.us, they should only be able to see publicly visible trainings and programs. But non-public things are shared here, and we don’t want those distributed outside of the channels that they’re shared on. That way we can make sure people are in the best trainings for them to be successful, but also that non-public info isn’t going into public spaces?
Correct! Mobilize is the best place to send people for events and trainings!
